hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that:Allah's Messenger (S) said: "When the Iqamah has been called for the Salat then there is no Salat except the obligatory

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ " إِذَا أُقِيمَتِ الصَّلاَةُ فَلاَ صَلاَةَ إِلاَّ الْمَكْتُوبَةُ "
chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About 'When The Iqamah Has Been Called For Salat Then There Is No Salat But The Obligatory'
